text_block_list.text: It was the day before the race when I heard that Zephyr's participation in the 'Selection Race' had been cancelled.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Uh, uh… my legs… Why… I… again…!

text_block_list.name: Infirmary Teacher
text_block_list.text: Geez… what a reckless training. It's only natural to get hurt in this situation. It's impossible to race in your current condition.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: No, I will race. You can't stop the wind once it starts blowing.

text_block_list.name: Infirmary Teacher
text_block_list.text: Don't be silly. If you push yourself now, you may never be able to run again.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: A calm doesn't mean that the wind stops, but that it disappears… If I can't become the wind in the race, then I…!
I proposed to Zephyr, who showed a dangerously strong will, to move to a sanatorium away from the school.
She once said that feeling the wind blowing calms her down. A sanatorium surrounded by nature should the place she needs to be in right now.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Right now, there must be many Uma Musume competing to reach the wind at the racetrack… But what am I doing…?
It's a waste to worry about something happening far away, when we're in a place with such a beautiful view.

text_block_list.name: Wild Bird
text_block_list.text: *chirp *chirp *chirp
choice_data_list: Look, even the bird wants you to take care of yourself

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: That's Mr. Necktie's voice.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Yes. Look, he's right there.
It was a japanese tit bird. It had a pattern like it was wearing a necktie. Let's say it was more understandable than Daruma-san.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: I was not able to hear the bird… until now. Maybe my heart was blown by the dry wind?
It's good that she was able to turn her attention to her surroundings. Maybe she'll calm down if she visited more places.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Ah… what a nice breeze. It feels like the wind in my heart.
choice_data_list: Have you calmed down a bit?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Yeah… I'm sorry trainer. I feel embarrassed about how I almost blew wintry wind in 'Summer'.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Being here reminds me of the past. I wasn't physically fit back then, so I spent a lot of time in places surrounded by nature.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Birds and animals were my only friends. I spent all day listening to birds. I was content with that kind of life, but…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: At the same time I felt like a light breeze, unable to cause a ripple in water.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: That's why I always yearned. To be like a strong wind.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: The wind is free and light, yet so strong… Nothing can disturb its path.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Back then I couldn't even run… So becoming the wind was my dream at the time.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: But, I was not determined. It was just a vague longing… that is… until I found what I was suppose to aim for―
(Waaaaaaaaaa!)

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: By chance, when I was watching a race… I saw the wind. The run that embodies the wind.
choice_data_list: Was it, the Uma Musume you admire?
Was it, the Uma Musume you admire?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Yeah… that figure, was just like the wind itself. A wild wind. It was at that moment that my vague yearning became a clear goal.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: I realized the wind I wish to become can only be found at the racetrack. And only during the race, it shows its true power.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: I've never said this to anyone before… It just came out of my mouth while talking to you… I wonder why?
I feel like I gained a bit of trust from her. If so―
choice_data_list: Please allow me to aid you in your recovery
Please allow me to aid you in your recovery

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …I don't know why you are willing to go through all that trouble for me, but… just like riding the sails, I will allow you to carry me.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Thank you so much, trainer. You really are a triumphant wind.
Thus, the rehabilitation of Yamanin Zephyr began!
In order to recover from your injury, we must not go through training that put too much load on your leg. Let's start with trunk training first.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: 'Be conscious of the arrangement of your body… the movement must be precise… never forget to keep your posture till the end… and your muscles… a storm.'
Pool training is an ideal rehab training menu that spreads the load on the whole body so it won't put a strain on the joints.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Right now I'm an offshore wind. An assassin running on the surface of water…
Eating is also training. Gotta get protein for damaged body. A low calory food with balanced vitamins and minerals as well.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Ah… My stomach is filled with wind of feast…
Most importantly, she should not tire herself out. Resting should also be part of the training.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Oh my, Mr. Matcha is a dumpling as usual. It looks like everyone is lined up to get blown away by a gust of wind. Fufu…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Trainer. I finished the menu.
Everything is going well so far. She should be able to resume training at the course soon.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Umm… Thank you…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: I can feel that I'm recovering fast. I had a hard time trying to recover without any help in the past so…
choice_data_list: That's what trainers are there for
That's what trainers are there for

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Cloudy thoughts are not suitable for a wind. Anxiety, fear, greed… I don't want to bring such unnecessary feelings to the race.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: All I want to think about, is the wind―

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: But every time I get injured, I get attacked by the dry wind. My mind will be clouded, and pulled away from the wind…
I finally understood why there were rumors about her lacking 'motivation'.
She tried to suppress her frustrations to stay calm every time she gets injured, or couldn't participate in the 'Selection Race'.
She did not want to bring those feelings to the race. That's what made it seem like she wasn't motivated.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: I won't be blown away by the hurricane anymore, thanks to you. I thank you with the bottom of my heart.
Zephyr has a pure heart. Her strong will, will surely make her wish come true.
However, a wish that is too pure is also a double-edged sword. What she needs right now is…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Such a breeze… But… thank you

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: If I had a trainer in charge, I think it would be someone like you…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: However, I will decline your offer―
